snippet.title: Amber Park | 位于东海岸公园的地标豪华公寓-永久产权 | Exquisite Penthouse In East Coast Park's Iconic Freehold Project!
snippet.description:
在安珀苑体验从未有过的海边生活。安珀苑是位于新加坡15区的最新永久产权豪华小区！跟Kristie一起参观安珀苑的掌上明珠——5卧室豪华阁楼公寓。

该公寓面积为2142平方英尺，拥有6米高的豪华双层天花板，并设有直面大海的落地窗。室内设计上，开发商不惜重金打造了一套奢华的住宅，采用了石英台面、伊朗大理石、瑞士高端品牌瑞族电器和德国高仪卫浴。

除了安珀苑标志性的棱角设计，该公寓还有一个超大屋顶平台，或称“云顶平台”。无论你是在600米的跑道上慢跑，还是在瑜伽平台上练习冥想，你都将享受到东海岸公园价值百万美元的海景带来的感官体验。

更多有关安珀苑的资料:

✅ 城市发展（CDL）和丰隆控股子公司丰地产开发
✅ 永久产权，位于新加坡15区，共 592个单位，包含从1到5居室的豪华公寓
✅ 公寓设施包括云顶平台和湖海湾
✅ 3分钟步行到丹戎加东地铁站，离商业中心和樟宜国际机场仅10-15分钟车程
✅ 附近学校有道南小学、丹绒加东小学、丹戎加东中学、圣婴女校 （加东）、光华小学、德明政府中学、芽笼美以美小学、海格女校

马上联系Kristie预约看房吧：+65 84985246

新加坡房产经纪许可证编号:L3002382K•R061035Z

-----------------------------------------

Experience seaside living like never before in Amber Park, District 15’s latest freehold project! Join Kristie on a tour of the crown jewel of Amber Park – the 5 Bedroom Premium Penthouse. #AmberParkCondo 

At 2,142 sqft, this unit offers a sumptuous 6m, double ceiling height with floor to ceiling windows that opens up to the sea. Inside, the developers have spared no expense in delivering a luxurious home from Quartz countertops, Iranian marble, appliances by Swiss brand VZUG and sanitary fittings by Grohe.  

Besides the iconic angular design of Amber Park, the project also offers a magnificent rooftop deck, or “The Stratosphere”. Whether you are enjoying a jog on the 600m jogging track or practicing mindfulness in the yoga deck, you’ll get to enjoy a sensorial experience that takes advantage of the million dollar sea view in East Coast Park. 

More information on Amber Park:

✅  Developed by CDL & Hong Leong Holdings Limited 
✅  Freehold condo in the prime location of District 15 with 592 total units ranging from 1 Bedders to 5 Bedroom Penthouses
✅  Full condo facilities including The Stratosphere & Lagoon Bay
✅  3mins walk to upcoming Tanjong Katong MRT, 10-15 mins drive to CBD & Changi Airport  
✅  Close to schools like Tao Nan School, Tanjong Katong Primary School, Tanjong Katong Secondary School, CHIJ (Katong) Primary, Kong Hwa School, Dunman High School, Geylang Methodist School, Haig Girls’ School

For private viewings, contact Kristie at +65 84985246 now! 

CEA Licence No: L3002382K • R061035Z

-----------------------------------------
QUICK JUMP CUTS

00:00 介绍 / Introduction 
00:09 关于安珀苑 / About Amber Park 
02:28 5卧室的豪华展示单元 / 5 Bedroom Premium Show Unit 
02:44 客厅及阳台(豪华5卧室) / Living Room & Balcony (5 Bedroom Premium) 
03:14 西式厨房 (豪华5卧室) / Dry Kitchen (5 Bedroom Premium) 
04:17 中式厨房(豪华5卧室) / Wet Kitchen (5 Bedroom Premium) 
05:06 次卧(豪华5卧室) / Common Bedrooms (5 Bedroom Premium) 
05:20 主卧和浴室(豪华5卧室) / Master Bedroom & Bathroom (5 Bedroom Premium) 
06:08 安珀苑设施 / Amber Park Facilities 
07:00 位置分析 / Location Analysis 
07:25 简评 / Final Comments 
08:43 总结|现在就联系Kristie来看房吧！ +65 84985246

-----------------------------------------
